attributes.action: Urge immarsat to publish to the public the raw data of flight track of MH370
attributes.additional_details: The search of missing flight MH370 has been fruitless since the 8th of March 2014. The family members are suffering from tremendous desperations. Immarsat as the only key holder to the track of the missing aviator is not yet publishing the raw data to the family members. I'm here to urge the organisation to give the raw data and restore the truth.
